title: French Fries
description: Golden and crispy, the perfect sidekick for any meal or a delightful snack all on their own.
steps: Peel and cut potatoes into thin strips.
Heat vegetable oil in a deep fryer or large pan to 350°F (175°C).
Fry the potato strips in batches until golden brown and crispy, about 3-4 minutes per batch.
Remove with a slotted spoon, drain on paper towels, and season with salt. Serve your French Fries.

title: Hot Dog
description: A classic favorite, a juicy sausage nestled in a soft bun, adorned with your favorite toppings.
steps: Preheat a grill or stovetop griddle.
Place the hot dogs on the grill and cook until heated through and grill marks appear.
Toast the buns on the grill until lightly browned.
Place a hot dog in each bun and add your choice of toppings, such as ketchup, mustard, onions, relish, sauerkraut, or shredded cheese.

title: Hamburger
description: Juicy, meaty, and topped with all your cravings, it's the iconic taste of American comfort.
steps: Preheat a grill or stovetop griddle.
Divide the ground beef into 4 portions and shape them into patties. Season with salt and pepper.
Grill the patties until they reach your desired level of doneness. Add cheese slices if desired and melt them on the patties.
Toast the hamburger buns on the grill until lightly browned.
Place a patty on each bun and add lettuce, tomato slices, onion slices, ketchup, mustard, and pickles to taste.

title: Bacon and Eggs
description: The timeless breakfast duo, where sizzling bacon meets perfectly fried eggs for a morning symphony of flavors.
steps: Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and cook the bacon until crispy. Remove and drain on paper towels.
In the same skillet, lower the heat to medium and add a little butter if desired.
Crack the eggs into the skillet and cook to your preferred level of doneness, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Serve your Bacon & Eggs with the cooked bacon and toast if desired.
